title: Leaver Buster Bug
body:
Hello Summoners...

I just want to let you know that there is a bug with the Leaver Buster. If you Alt + F4 and press "Leave Game" (as opposed to clicking "Exit" in the Settings menu), Leaver Buster won't affect you. I've done this about 9-10 times on my main account without repercussion (I'm hoping you won't ban me for honesty).

Just thought you may want to check that out.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
The thing with the Leavebuster system is that it will look at the consistency of leaves/AFKs. There needs to be a significant number over a short period of time (for example, 5 with the course of a month) for a player to get picked up by the system. Not to mention, each instance would need to last at least 5 minutes for the system to even consider it.

As an example, you could have 2 players each with 12 leaves over the course of a year. The first player has those leaves spread out relatively evenly, so once a month. The second has them all occurring in a 1-2 month period. The first would avoid being picked up for punishment, as there's no significant frequency to them while the second *should* get picked up and punished, since it's a very significant number of leaves over a (relatively) short period.

So this would only indicate a bug if it's over a shorter amount of time, like 1-2 months, not if it's spaced out over (for arguments sake) 5 months or so.

Leaver Buster is based on a comparison of game's AFKed/leaved versus how many games you actually play.

As long as you don't reach a certain percent based on how many game's you play in total during a week/month Leaver Buster will never touch you.
